hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn ‘Abbas said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was brought some milk. On his right was Ibn ‘Abbas and on his left was Khalid bin Walid. The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said to Ibn ‘Abbas: ‘Will you permit me to give Khalid to drink?’ Ibn ‘Abbas said: ‘I would not like to give preference to anyone over myself when it comes to the leftover drink of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ). So Ibn ‘Abbas took it and drank some, then Khalid drank some.”

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا شَرِبَ أَعْطَى الأَيْمَنَ فَالأَيْمَنَ
chapter.eng-name: When drinking, the (vessel) should be passed around to the right
